26 -def read_adjacency(file, comment="#", sep=None): 

27      for line in file: 
28          line = line.rstrip() 
29          if line[0] != comment: 
30              entry = line.split(sep) 
31              nid = entry[0] 
32              if "in:" in entry: 
33                  d_index = entry.index("in:") 
34                  p_index = entry.index("out:") 
35                  in_degree = entry[d_index+1:p_index] 
36                  out_degree = entry[p_index+1:] 
37                  adj = entry[1:d_index] 
38              else: 
39                  adj = entry[1:] 
40                  out_degree = adj 
41                  in_degree = [] 
42              node = DegreeNode(nid,in_degree,adj, out_degree)  
43              yield node
